Elements and attributes are described here, with an associated table and column name. These associations should be loosely applied and do not indicate that the element or attribute is associated only with the indicated table and column. Do not access tables directly. The tables should only be accessed through exposed APIs and Business Intelligence. Accessing them directly may result in issues when applying software updates.

AdditionalAttribute Associated With Table: YFS_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTE
Stores dynamic attributes attached with an entity. Currently used to store additional attributes for item and category entities.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AdditionalAttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_additional_attribute.additional_attribute_key
Primary key attribute of YFS_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTE.
AttributeDomainIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_additional_attribute.attribute_domain_id
The unique identification of the attribute domain.
AttributeGroupIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_additional_attribute.attribute_group_id
The unique identification of the attribute group.
DoubleValuedecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_additional_attribute.double_value
The value of the assigned attribute whose data type is 'DECIMAL'.
IntegerValuenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 20) yfs_additional_attribute.integer_value
The value of the assigned attribute whose data type is 'INTEGER'.
IsInheritedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_additional_attribute.is_inherited
This field indicates whether the assignment of attribute value as additional attribute was based on inheritance. For ParentTable='YFS_CATEGORY', a value of 'Y' indicates that the assignment is based on inheritance of the value assigned to the upper level category. For ParentTable='YFS_ITEM', a value of 'Y' indicates that the assignment is based on inheritance of the value assigned to the category to which the item belongs.
Namestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_additional_attribute.name
Name of the dynamic attribute.
Valuestring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_additional_attribute.value
Value of the attribute.
AdditionalAttributeList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column

AssignedValue Associated With Table: YFS_ADDITIONAL_ATTRIBUTE
The attributes in this element are the values stored as AdditionalAttribute records for the ItemAttribute record under which it appears. For an Attribute configured as a derived attribute, the Value is the configured value for the derived attribute. The value itself is not assigned to the category. IsInherited flag will not appear for a derived attribute.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DoubleValuedecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_additional_attribute.double_value
The value of the assigned attribute whose data type is 'DECIMAL'.
IntegerValuenonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 20) yfs_additional_attribute.integer_value
The value of the assigned attribute whose data type is 'INTEGER'.
IsInheritedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_additional_attribute.is_inherited
This field indicates whether the assignment of attribute value as additional attribute was based on inheritance. For ParentTable='YFS_CATEGORY', a value of 'Y' indicates that the assignment is based on inheritance of the value assigned to the upper level category. For ParentTable='YFS_ITEM', a value of 'Y' indicates that the assignment is based on inheritance of the value assigned to the category to which the item belongs.
LongDescriptionstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_attr_allowed_value.long_description
The detailed description of the allowed value.
SequenceNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_attr_allowed_value.seq_no
The sequence of the allowed value within the attribute definition.
ShortDescriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_attr_allowed_value.short_description
The short description of the allowed value.
Valuestring (maximum length: 2000) yfs_additional_attribute.value
Value of the attribute.
AssignedValueList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Attribute Associated With Table: YFS_ATTRIBUTE
This table stores attribute definitions. Attributes represent characteristics of entities and can be assigned to an attribute group.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AllowMultipleValuesflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_attribute.allow_multiple_values
This flag indicates whether multiple values are allowed to be assigned for this attribute. Default value: "N".
AllowedValueLengthpositiveInteger (total number of digits: 3) yfs_attribute.allowed_value_length
The maximum length allowed for a value of Data Type = 'TEXT'. If not passed, the maximum length allowed is 200.
AttributeDomainIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_attribute.attribute_domain_id
The unique identification of the attribute domain.
AttributeGroupIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_attribute.attribute_group_id
The unique identification of the attribute group.
AttributeIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_attribute.attribute_id
The unique identifier of the attribute.
AttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_attribute.attribute_key
The primary key for the YFS_ATTRIBUTE table.
AttributePostFixstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_attribute.attribute_post_fix
The post fix to be applied to the value of this attribute.
DataTypestring (maximum length: 20) yfs_attribute.data_type
The data type allowed for the value of the attribute.
Allowed ValueDescription
DECIMAL Allowed Value is a Decimal. 
BOOLEAN Allowed Value is a Boolean. 
INTEGER Allowed Value is an Integer. 
TEXT Allowed Value is a Text. 
DATE Allowed Value is a Date. 

DerivedFromAttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_attribute.derived_from_attr_key
The primary key of the attribute record from which this attribute is derived.
IsAllowedValueDefinedflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_attribute.is_allowed_value_defined
This flag indicates whether a set of allowed values are defined for this attribute. Default value: "N".
IsValueMandatoryflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_attribute.is_value_mandatory
This flag indicates whether this attribute requires a mandatory selection of value when assigned to an item. Default value: "N".
LongDescriptionstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_attribute.long_description
The detailed description of the attribute.
OrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_attribute.organization_code
The organization that maintains the attribute domain.
SequenceNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_attribute.seq_no
The sequence of this attribute within the attribute group.
ShortDescriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_attribute.short_description
The short description of the attribute.
AttributeAllowedValue Associated With Table: YFS_ATTR_ALLOWED_VALUE
This table stores allowed values of attribute definition.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AttributeAllowedValueKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_attr_allowed_value.attr_allowed_value_key
The primary key for the YFS_ATTR_ALLOWED_VALUE table.
AttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_attr_allowed_value.attribute_key
The attribute that the allowed value belongs to.
IsDefaultValueflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_attr_allowed_value.is_default_value
This flag indicates whether this value is the default value of the attribute. Default value: "N".
LongDescriptionstring (maximum length: 255) yfs_attr_allowed_value.long_description
The detailed description of the allowed value.
NumericStepdecimal (total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_attr_allowed_value.numeric_step
The incremental step of the allowed value within the numeric value range. For instance, if the numeric value range is from 0 to 100 and the numeric step is 5, the allowed values are 0, 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, etc.
SequenceNononNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) yfs_attr_allowed_value.seq_no
The sequence of the allowed value within the attribute definition.
ShortDescriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_attr_allowed_value.short_description
The short description of the allowed value.
Valuestring (maximum length: 200) yfs_attr_allowed_value.value
The allowed value of the attribute that a user is entitled to assign. For an attribute of Numeric or Decimal Datatype, this value may be a list of values and/or a range of values. Each value in the list may be separated by a ';'. A range must be specified by two values separated by a '-'.
AttributeAllowedValueList
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
TotalNumberOfRecordsnonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 5) .
Number of Records in the DB satisfying the passed criteria.
AttributeReference Associated With Table: YFS_ATTRIBUTE_REFERENCE
This table stores references of predefined attribute definition to fields of YFS_ITEM or item alias name.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AttributeKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_attribute_reference.attribute_key
The attribute that this reference field is assigned to.
AttributeReferenceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_attribute_reference.attribute_reference_key
The primary key attribute of YFS_ATTRIBUTE_REFERENCE table.
ReferenceNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_attribute_reference.reference_name
The reference name that the predefined attribute represents. If the tablename is 'YFS_ITEM', then this field contains the XML name of the field that the attribute represents. If the tablename is 'YFS_ITEM_ALIAS', then this field contains the item alias name that the attribute represents.
TableNamestring (maximum length: 40) yfs_attribute_reference.table_name
The name of the database table that contains the field assigned to a predefined attribute definition. Valid values : 'YFS_ITEM' or 'YFS_ITEM_ALIAS'.
BundleOverallTotals
Deprecated as Sterling Selling And Fulfillment Suite 9.0 . See ComputedPrice element for more details. The overall total of a bundle parent when including its components. Components with IsLinePriceForInformationOnly flag set to Y are ignored in the total calculation. If the bundle parent is a recommended line, then the total will be based on the BundlePricingStrategy defined for the item.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
GrandChargesdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Charges for the bundle across all its components.

GrandDiscountsdecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
Total Discounts for the bundle across all its components.

BuyerContactAddress Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
AddressIDstring (maximum length: 256) yfs_person_info.address_id
A user specified label for an address.
AddressLine1string (maximum length: 70) yfs_person_info.address_line1
The address line 1 field.

The address line 3 field.

The address line 4 field.

The address line 6 field.

The beeper number at which the person or a predesignated employee of the organization referred to in the address can be called.

ChargeCategoryDetails Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_CATEGORY
This table stores categorization of charges in the system. Categorization is stored at a rule set level. Examples would be "Shipping", "Handling", "Personalization", etc.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
ChargeCategoryKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_charge_category.charge_category_key
Primary key of charge category.
ConsiderForProfitMarginflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.consider_for_profit_margin
Indicates if a charge is included in the profit margin calculation.
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_charge_category.description
Description of charge. Used for display purposes during configuration.
IsBillableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_billable
Indicates if a charge is billable to the customer.
IsDiscountflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_discount
Indicates if a charge category is a discount category.
IsRefundableflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_charge_category.is_refundable
Indicates if a charge is refundable during returns.
ChargeNameDetails Associated With Table: YFS_CHARGE_NAME
This table stores next level of categorization of charges. For a given charge category, there could be multiple charge names associated with it. For example, "Shipping" charge category may have charges like "Mileage", "Documentation Fees" etc.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
Descriptionstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_charge_name.description
Description of a charge name.

A Component Definition

ContactPersonInfo Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.

HazmatInformation Associated With Table: YFS_HAZMAT_COMPLIANCE
This table stores hazardous material compliance data as published by the US Department of Transportation (DOT). This data is pertinent to code of federal regulations as formulated by the US Department of Transportation (DOT).
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
CargoAirstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.cargo_air
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping via cargo aircraft.
Exceptionstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.exception
Indicates the packing exceptions while shipping the hazardous material.
HazardClassstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.hazard_class
Indicates the category of a hazard assigned to a hazardous material. Its value ranges from 1 to 9.
HazmatComplianceKeykey (maximum length: 24) yfs_hazmat_compliance.hazmat_compliance_key
The primary key for the YFS_HAZMAT_COMPLIANCE table.
Labelstring (maximum length: 30) yfs_hazmat_compliance.label
Indicates the label code.
PackingGroupstring (maximum length: 5) yfs_hazmat_compliance.packing_group
Packing Groups (PG) indicate the degree of danger of a hazardous material within its hazard class or division and relate to the strength of packaging required for shipment. It can take values Packing Group I - high danger, Packing Group II - medium danger, Packing Group III - low danger.
PassengerAirstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.passenger_air
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping via passenger aircraft or rail.
ProperShippingNamestring (maximum length: 512) yfs_hazmat_compliance.proper_shipping_name
Indicates the proper shipping name or description of hazardous material.
QtyBulkstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.qty_bulk
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping bulk.
QtyNonBulkstring (maximum length: 15) yfs_hazmat_compliance.qty_non_bulk
Indicates the max quantity that can be shipped while shipping non bulk.
SortOrdernonNegativeInteger (total number of digits: 6) yfs_hazmat_compliance.sort_order
Unique number to identify a hazardous substance. The difference between the preceding and the succeeding sort order value equals to five. This is to accommodate new hazardous materials.
SpecialProvisionsstring (maximum length: 100) yfs_hazmat_compliance.special_provisions
Indicates the special provisions to be provided while shipping the hazardous material.
Symbolsstring (maximum length: 8) yfs_hazmat_compliance.symbols
Indicates the symbol of hazardous material.
UNNumberstring (maximum length: 10) yfs_hazmat_compliance.un_number
UN numbers are four-digit numbers that identify hazardous substances and products (such as explosives and poisonous materials) of commercial importance. This is widely used in international commerce, for instance to label the contents of shipping containers.
Vesselstring (maximum length: 5) yfs_hazmat_compliance.vessel
Specifies where the cargo is stowed on a vessel.
VesselSPstring (maximum length: 35) yfs_hazmat_compliance.vessel_sp
Specifies other stowage plans.

IsManualstring (maximum length: 1) yfs_line_charges.is_manual
Determines whether the charge was manually created or created automatically through pricing engine. Valid Values: Y , N , or M Default: Y .
Allowed ValueDescription
Y Indicates that the charge was created manually. 
N Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine. 
M Indicates that the charge was automatically generated through the pricing engine due to a manual pricing rule being applied. 

IsRefundableflag (maximum length: 1) .
Describes if the charge is refundable. Default: Y
IsShippingChargeflag (maximum length: 1) .
Determines whether the charge is a shipping charge. This attribute value is system defined and cannot be overridden. The value for this attribute is set as Y only for Charge Name configured as CHARGE_NAME_FOR_SHIPPING in financial rule. For all other Charges this attribute is set to N .

ManualOverridePercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage discount that a customer has received on a line based on the List Price. This percentage does not consider taxes, shipping charges, etc. Only Charges considered for profit margin are considered in the calculation. While ManualDiscountPercentage only considers manual discounts, this calculation also factors in manual price overrides. 100 - 100 *(ExtendedPrice + Sum of LineCharges Considered For Profit) / (ListPrice * PricingQty + Sum of Non-Manual LineCharges Considered For Profit)

total number of digits: 15
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The total option price for this line.
PercentProfitMargindecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		.
The percentage of the amount being made on the product being sold. ((UnitCost of the Item multiplied by ActualPricingQty) subtracted from (ExtendedPrice added to the LineCharges that are considered for profit margin calculation)) divided by (ExtendedPrice added to the LineCharges that are considered for profit margin calculation)
If ExtendedPrice+LineCharges is zero, PercentProfitMargin is not returned. OrderLine Option OptionPrices and OrderLine AdditionalLinePriceTotals are not considered for the Profit Margin.

Opportunity Associated With Table: YFS_OPPORTUNITY
This tables stores an opportunity. An opportunity is a sales opportunity that a sales representative foresees and is used to keep track of multiple quotes that will be presented to a specific buyer. Any of these quotes can be negotiated upon but only one of these quotes can be accepted by the buyer, thereby permanently rejecting all other quotes. The opportunity will be closed once an order is created from the buyer selected quote.

Validation ConditionError
Input document is invalid.
YFS10363Input document is empty or contains invalid data.
Mandated parameters missing.
YFS10364Mandatory Parameters for the Operation are missing.
Opportunity record already existed.
YCP0051Record Already Exists
Event template not found.
YFS10429Template xml for raising event not found
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
BillToIDstring (maximum length: 40) yfs_opportunity.bill_to_id
The identifier of the bill to customer. If a customer definition representing the buyer organization exists within the system, the BillToID can represent the CustomerID of the customer. Otherwise, the BillToID can represent the PersonID of the bill to address or the BuyerOrganizationCode of the buyer organization.
BuyerContactAddressKeystring (maximum length: 24) yfs_opportunity.buyer_contact_address_key
The buyer's contact address. For new records, the BuyerContactAddressKey is the bill to address key defaulted from the customer contact address. If customer contact is not available, the customer account address is used, otherwise obtaining from the buyer organization default address.

BuyerOrganizationCodestring (maximum length: 24) yfs_opportunity.buyer_organization_code
The buyer organization that is associated with this opportunity. This must be a valid organization defined in the system.

DefaultCustomerInformationflag (maximum length: 1) .
Indicates if the billing, shipping, payment, tax, and currency information on the order should be defaulted from the customer information. When the flag is set to "Y", and a valid customer is found, the billing, shipping, and tax information on the order will be defaulted either from the customer or from the customer contact. The payment method on the order will only be defaulted if there is no payment method on the order. The currency will only be defaulted if the customer's IsDefaultCurrency is set to 'Y'.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

DefaultTemplateflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.default_template

See YFS_SHIPMENT_CONTAINER.carrier_payment_type for additional information.

The document type that is associated with this order. For example, Sales Order document (0001), Planned Order document (0002), Return Order document (0003) , and Purchase Order document (0005). This field determines the order's fulfillment cycle and controls the inventory and payment updates performed on the order.

This field indicates the exchange type of the order. The payment processing logic is dependent on this attribute.
Allowed ValueDescription
REGULAR Indicates that this is a regular exchange. 
ADVANCED_PP Indicates that this is an advanced pre-paid exchange.

ExpirationDatedateTimeyfs_order_header.expiration_date
The date by which the quote has to be accepted by customer. This only applies to Quotes. The expiration date is computed by the expiration policy before presenting a quote to the customer. The expiration date is computed by adding EXPIRATION_PERIOD rule to the current date. The expiration date can also be updated before presenting to the customer. If the date is overridden, further computations of the date are ignored and the overridden expiration date is published on the quote for the customer.

HoldFlagflag (maximum length: 1) yfs_order_header.hold_flag
This flag determines whether an hold has been placed on the order when certain hold types criteria are met. If order is on hold, default configuration will stop the shceduling and release process for the order. The flag is reset to 'N' when all the hold types have been resolved on the order and all of its order lines. Based on hold type configuration, certain transactions may not be allowed to process. Note that there is no validation made on the hold applied but this flag can be reset by the application based on hold types existed on the order.
Default: N
Valid Values: Y or N

The reason code for putting the order on hold.

PersonInfoBillTo Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. The key of this table is posted in various tables to allow access to people and address information.

PersonInfoShipTo Associated With Table: YFS_PERSON_INFO
This table stores relevant personal information and addresses. Addresses are typically organization address, ship node address, customer address, and so forth. Personal information is required in cases where person to person contact needs to be established; for example, taking appointments or speaking during negotiations. BundleFulfillmentModestring (maximum length: 2) yfs_item.bundle_fulfillment_mode
The way in which the bundle will be fulfilled. It can be Ship Together(01), Ship Independent(00), or Deliver Together(02) for Bundle Item. Default value is Ship Together(01) for Bundle Item.
BundlePricingStrategystring (maximum length: 6) yfs_item.bundle_price_strat
Determines how a bundle will be priced. A bundle can by priced by PARENT (only the parent's price is used), COMP (only the components' prices are used), or ALL (both parent's and components' prices are used). Default: PARENT.
Allowed ValueDescription
PARENT Bundle pricing should only include the totals from the bundle parent. 
COMP Bundle pricing should only include the totals from the components of the bundle. 
ALL Bundle pricing should include the totals from both the bundle parent and its components.

This flag indicates that the item is a configurable item. A configurable item can either be a bundle or a physical kit. A configurable bundle item offers a number of different options from which a customer can select before buying the product. Components for a bundle are not specified in the catalog as the actual components will be determined by the user when an order is placed. A physical kit must always be pre-configured.

SafetyFactorDefinition Associated With Table: YFS_SKU_SAFETY_FACTOR_DEFN
This table stores safety factor definition.
AttributeTypeRequiredTable.Column
DeliveryMethodstring (maximum length: 100) .

FutureSafetyFactorPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_sku_safety_factor_defn.future_safety_factor_pct
The future safety factor percentage of this item. The FutureSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual future availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply future safety factor.
OnhandSafetyFactorPercentagedecimal (total number of digits: 5
fraction digits: 2) 		yfs_sku_safety_factor_defn.onhand_safety_factor_pct
The on-hand safety factor percentage of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor. OnhandSafetyFactorPercentage will be used only when OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity is not specified.
OnhandSafetyFactorQuantitydecimal (minimum value: 0
total number of digits: 14
fraction digits: 4) 		yfs_sku_safety_factor_defn.onhand_safety_factor_qty
The on-hand safety factor quantity of this item. The OnhandSafetyFactorQuantity will be excluded from the actual on-hand availability of the item if the scheduling rule, node type, and supply type are configured to apply on-hand safety factor.
